      • writeSTToOutDir

        public static void writeSTToOutDir(java.lang.String filename,
                   java.lang.String outputDirectory,
                   org.stringtemplate.v4.ST toWrite)
        Same as writeStringToOutDir(String, String, String) but uses the built in file writing of a stringtemplate
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file to be created/overwritten
        outputDirectory - directory to write the file in
        toWrite - StringTemplate to render to a file

                       java.lang.String toWrite)
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file to be created/overwritten
        outputDirectory - directory to write the file in
        toWrite - String to be written to the file

      • hexStringToByteArray

        public static byte[] hexStringToByteArray(java.lang.String s)
        from this stackoverflow post
        Parameters:
        s - String representation of a hedicamal number. Method will throw an exception if the string has odd length
        Returns:
        Byte array represented by s

      • parseByteArray

        public static byte[] parseByteArray(java.lang.String arrayRep)
        Parameters:
        arrayRep - comma separated string of base 10 bytes. Arrays.toString() of a byte array will create valid input to this method
        Returns:
        byte array represented by arrayRep

      • parseIntArray

        public static int[] parseIntArray(java.lang.String arrayRep)
        Parameters:
        arrayRep - comma separated string of ints. Arrays.toString() of a byte array will create valid input to this method
        Returns:
        byte array represented by arrayRep
